Text:
The meat grinder requires a sacrifice. Will you be able to stay away from the chopping block? 
The player with the fewest kills is eliminated every set amount of time. Smaller maps with FFA recommended. 

Credit to KillerPigeon for the idea and many thanks to w*pro*k (sorry your name caused publish issues like you talk about smh) and FoxDie for letting me copy their homework.
The amount of time between the beginning of the game and the first elimination.
Reset every players kill points each time a player is eliminated.
Reset points at this game time, recommend choosing a number before the first elimination to create a sort of "treaty" time where kills don't count towards first elimination
Victory Options (Can push down UI & is ugly)
The first player/team with the fewest kills will be eliminated in %1INITIALTIME% minutes.
The next player/team with the fewest kills will be eliminated in %1INCREMENTALTIME% minutes.
